article_title: Obamacare's True Costs Are Finally Coming To Light

article_metadata.description: Obamacare has caused premiums to spike across the country. And thanks to the U.S. Supreme Court's decision last week, the law's ever-higher premiums are here to stay.
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
